confirmDialog.text:
Do you really want to close the chat?
Other members will not have access to its content anymore and you won't be able to reopen it.
Being its creator, you will still have access to the content.

notOnTheList.notradead: If your story is great, and weâ€™d like to share it broadly, weâ€™ll send you an email back asking your permission before publishing anything. Promise.
